# OCI2Git [![Documentation](https://docs.rs/oci2git/badge.svg)][documentation] [![Crates.io](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/oci2git.svg)](https://crates.io/crates/oci2git) [![License](https://img.shields.io/crates/l/oci2git.svg)](https://github.com/Virviil/oci2git/blob/master/LICENSE)

# OCI2Git [![Dokumentacja](https://docs.rs/oci2git/badge.svg)][documentation] [![Crates.io](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/oci2git.svg)](https://crates.io/crates/oci2git) [![Licencja](https://img.shields.io/crates/l/oci2git.svg)](https://github.com/Virviil/oci2git/blob/master/LICENSE)

Content:
[![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/crates/d/oci2git.svg)](https://crates.io/crates/oci2git) [//]: # (mock for future test.yaml) [//]: # ([![Test Status](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/Virviil/oci2git/rust.yml?branch=master&event=push&label=Test)](https://github.com/Virviil/oci2git/actions))
A Rust application that converts container images (Docker, etc.) to Git repositories. Each container layer is represented as a Git commit, preserving the history and structure of the original image. ![Demo of OCI2Git converting the nginx image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Virviil/oci2git/main/./assets/nginx.gif) ## Features - Analyze Docker images and extract layer information - Create a Git repository where each image layer is represented as a commit - Support for empty layers (ENV, WORKDIR, etc.) as empty commits - Complete metadata extraction to Markdown format - Extensible architecture for supporting different container engines ## Use Cases ### Layer Diffing When troubleshooting container issues, you can use Git's powerful diffing capabilities to identify exactly what changed between any two layers. By running `git diff` between commits, engineers can see precisely which files were added, modified, or deleted, making it much easier to understand the impact of each Dockerfile instruction and locate problematic changes. ![Example for layer diff](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Virviil/oci2git/main/./assets/layer-diff.png) ### Origin Tracking Using `git blame`, developers can quickly determine which layer introduced a specific file or line of code. This is particularly valuable when diagnosing issues with configuration files or dependencies. Instead of manually inspecting each layer, you can immediately trace the origin of any file back to its source layer and corresponding Dockerfile instruction. ### File Lifecycle Tracking OCI2Git enables you to follow a specific file's journey throughout the container image's history. You can observe when a file was initially created, how it was modified across layers, and if/when it was eventually removed. This comprehensive view helps understand file evolution without having to manually track changes across potentially dozens of layers. To track the history of a file in your container image ‚Äî including when it first appeared, was changed, or deleted ‚Äî you can use these Git commands after conversion:
Translation:
[![Pobrania](https://img.shields.io/crates/d/oci2git.svg)](https://crates.io/crates/oci2git) [//]: # (mock na potrzeby przysz≈Çego test.yaml) [//]: # ([![Status testu](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/Virviil/oci2git/rust.yml?branch=master&event=push&label=Test)](https://github.com/Virviil/oci2git/actions))
Aplikacja Rust, kt√≥ra konwertuje obrazy kontener√≥w (Docker itd.) do repozytori√≥w Git. Ka≈ºda warstwa kontenera jest reprezentowana jako commit Git, zachowujƒÖc historiƒô i strukturƒô oryginalnego obrazu. ![Demo OCI2Git konwertujƒÖcego obraz nginx](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Virviil/oci2git/main/./assets/nginx.gif) ## Funkcje - Analizuj obrazy Docker i wyodrƒôbniaj informacje o warstwach - Tw√≥rz repozytorium Git, gdzie ka≈ºda warstwa obrazu jest reprezentowana jako commit - Obs≈Çuga pustych warstw (ENV, WORKDIR itd.) jako pustych commit√≥w - Pe≈Çna ekstrakcja metadanych do formatu Markdown - Rozszerzalna architektura do obs≈Çugi r√≥≈ºnych silnik√≥w kontener√≥w ## Przypadki u≈ºycia ### Por√≥wnywanie warstw Podczas rozwiƒÖzywania problem√≥w z kontenerami mo≈ºesz u≈ºyƒá potƒô≈ºnych mo≈ºliwo≈õci por√≥wnywania Git, aby dok≈Çadnie zidentyfikowaƒá, co zmieni≈Ço siƒô pomiƒôdzy dowolnymi dwoma warstwami. UruchamiajƒÖc `git diff` miƒôdzy commitami, in≈ºynierowie mogƒÖ zobaczyƒá, kt√≥re pliki zosta≈Çy dodane, zmodyfikowane lub usuniƒôte, co znacznie u≈Çatwia zrozumienie wp≈Çywu ka≈ºdej instrukcji Dockerfile i lokalizowanie problematycznych zmian. ![Przyk≈Çad por√≥wnania warstw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Virviil/oci2git/main/./assets/layer-diff.png) ### ≈öledzenie pochodzenia U≈ºywajƒÖc `git blame`, programi≈õci mogƒÖ szybko okre≈õliƒá, kt√≥ra warstwa wprowadzi≈Ça dany plik lub liniƒô kodu. Jest to szczeg√≥lnie warto≈õciowe podczas diagnozowania problem√≥w z plikami konfiguracyjnymi lub zale≈ºno≈õciami. Zamiast rƒôcznie przeszukiwaƒá ka≈ºdƒÖ warstwƒô, mo≈ºesz natychmiast prze≈õledziƒá pochodzenie dowolnego pliku do jego ≈∫r√≥d≈Çowej warstwy i odpowiadajƒÖcej instrukcji Dockerfile. ### ≈öledzenie cyklu ≈ºycia pliku OCI2Git pozwala ≈õledziƒá historiƒô konkretnego pliku w ca≈Çym obrazie kontenera. Mo≈ºesz obserwowaƒá, kiedy plik zosta≈Ç utworzony, jak by≈Ç modyfikowany w kolejnych warstwach i czy/zosta≈Ç usuniƒôty. Ten kompleksowy widok pozwala zrozumieƒá ewolucjƒô pliku bez konieczno≈õci rƒôcznego ≈õledzenia zmian przez dziesiƒÖtki warstw. Aby ≈õledziƒá historiƒô pliku w obrazie kontenera ‚Äî w tym, kiedy pojawi≈Ç siƒô po raz pierwszy, zosta≈Ç zmieniony lub usuniƒôty ‚Äî mo≈ºesz u≈ºyƒá tych polece≈Ñ Git po konwersji:

Content:
```bash
# Full history of a file (including renames)
git log --follow -- /rootfs/my/file/path

# First appearance (i.e. creation) - see which layer introduced the file
git log --diff-filter=A -- /rootfs/my/file/path

# All changes made to the file (with diffs)
git log -p --follow -- /rootfs/my/file/path

# When the file was deleted
git log --diff-filter=D -- /rootfs/my/file/path

# Show short commit info (concise layer history)
git log --follow --oneline -- /rootfs/my/file/path
```
Translation:
```bash
# Full history of a file (including renames)
git log --follow -- /rootfs/my/file/path

# First appearance (i.e. creation) - see which layer introduced the file
git log --diff-filter=A -- /rootfs/my/file/path

# All changes made to the file (with diffs)
git log -p --follow -- /rootfs/my/file/path

# When the file was deleted
git log --diff-filter=D -- /rootfs/my/file/path

# Show short commit info (concise layer history)
git log --follow --oneline -- /rootfs/my/file/path
```

Content:
These commands make it simple to trace any file's complete history across container layers without the complexity of manually extracting and comparing layer tarballs.

### Multi-Layer Analysis
Sometimes the most insightful comparisons come from examining changes across multiple non-consecutive layers. With OCI2Git, you can use Git's comparison tools to analyze how components evolved over multiple build stages, identifying patterns that might be invisible when looking only at adjacent layers.

### Layer Exploration
By using `git checkout` to move to any specific commit, you can examine the container filesystem exactly as it existed at that layer. This allows developers to inspect the precise state of files and directories at any point in the image's creation process, providing invaluable context when debugging or examining container behavior.
![Checkout to previous commit](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Virviil/oci2git/main/./assets/checkout.png)

### Multi-Image Analysis

When working with multiple container images that share common ancestry, OCI2Git intelligently creates branches only when the images actually diverge. This allows you to analyze multiple related images in a single repository while preserving their common history.
Translation:
Te polecenia umo≈ºliwiajƒÖ ≈Çatwe ≈õledzenie pe≈Çnej historii dowolnego pliku w warstwach kontenera bez konieczno≈õci rƒôcznego wyodrƒôbniania i por√≥wnywania archiw√≥w warstw.

### Analiza wielowarstwowa
Czasami najbardziej warto≈õciowe por√≥wnania wynikajƒÖ z badania zmian pomiƒôdzy wieloma, niekolejnymi warstwami. Dziƒôki OCI2Git mo≈ºesz u≈ºywaƒá narzƒôdzi por√≥wnawczych Git do analizy ewolucji komponent√≥w na r√≥≈ºnych etapach budowy, identyfikujƒÖc wzorce, kt√≥re mogƒÖ byƒá niewidoczne przy oglƒÖdaniu tylko sƒÖsiednich warstw.

### Eksploracja warstw
KorzystajƒÖc z `git checkout` do przechodzenia do dowolnego konkretnego commita, mo≈ºesz zbadaƒá system plik√≥w kontenera dok≈Çadnie tak, jak wyglƒÖda≈Ç w danej warstwie. Pozwala to deweloperom analizowaƒá dok≈Çadny stan plik√≥w i katalog√≥w w ka≈ºdym punkcie procesu tworzenia obrazu, zapewniajƒÖc nieoceniony kontekst podczas debugowania lub badania zachowania kontenera.
![Przej≈õcie do poprzedniego commita](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Virviil/oci2git/main/./assets/checkout.png)

### Analiza wielu obraz√≥w

PracujƒÖc z wieloma obrazami kontener√≥w, kt√≥re majƒÖ wsp√≥lne pochodzenie, OCI2Git inteligentnie tworzy ga≈Çƒôzie tylko wtedy, gdy obrazy rzeczywi≈õcie siƒô rozchodzƒÖ. Pozwala to analizowaƒá wiele powiƒÖzanych obraz√≥w w jednym repozytorium, zachowujƒÖc ich wsp√≥lnƒÖ historiƒô.

Content:
```bash
# Convert first image to create the base repository
oci2git postgres:16.9-alpine3.21 -o alp

# Convert second image to the same output folder
oci2git nginx:1.28.0-alpine-slim -o alp
```
Translation:
```bash
# Convert first image to create the base repository
oci2git postgres:16.9-alpine3.21 -o alp

# Convert second image to the same output folder
oci2git nginx:1.28.0-alpine-slim -o alp
```

Content:
OCI2Git automatically detects shared layers between images and creates a branching structure that reflects their common base. The Git history will show:
- A common trunk containing all shared layers
- Separate branches that diverge only when the images actually differ
- Clear visualization of where images share common ancestry vs. where they become unique
- Smart duplicate handling: if the exact same image is processed twice, the algorithm detects this before the final metadata commit and skips creating a duplicate branch

This approach is particularly valuable for:
- **Image Family Analysis**: Understanding how different variants of an image (different versions, architectures, or configurations) relate to each other
- **Base Image Impact**: Seeing exactly how changes to a base image affect multiple derived images
- **Optimization Opportunities**: Identifying shared components that could be better leveraged across image variants

![Multi-image repository structure showing shared base and diverging branches](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Virviil/oci2git/main/./assets/multiimage.png)

### Additional Use Cases

- **Security Auditing**: Identify exactly when vulnerable packages or configurations were introduced and trace them back to specific build instructions.
- **Image Optimization**: Analyze layer structures to find redundant operations or large files that could be consolidated, helping to reduce image size.
- **Dependency Management**: Monitor when dependencies were added, upgraded, or removed across the image history.
- **Build Process Improvement**: Examine layer composition to optimize Dockerfile instructions for better caching and smaller image size.
- **Cross-Image Comparison**: Convert multiple related images to Git repositories and use Git's comparison tools to analyze their differences and commonalities.

## Installation

### Package Managers

#### macOS / Linux (Homebrew)
Translation:
OCI2Git automatycznie wykrywa wsp√≥≈Çdzielone warstwy miƒôdzy obrazami i tworzy strukturƒô rozga≈Çƒôzie≈Ñ odzwierciedlajƒÖcƒÖ ich wsp√≥lnƒÖ bazƒô. Historia Git pokazuje:
- Wsp√≥lny pie≈Ñ zawierajƒÖcy wszystkie wsp√≥≈Çdzielone warstwy
- Oddzielne ga≈Çƒôzie, kt√≥re rozchodzƒÖ siƒô dopiero wtedy, gdy obrazy faktycznie siƒô r√≥≈ºniƒÖ
- Wyra≈∫nƒÖ wizualizacjƒô, gdzie obrazy majƒÖ wsp√≥lnego przodka, a gdzie stajƒÖ siƒô unikalne
- Inteligentne zarzƒÖdzanie duplikatami: je≈õli dok≈Çadnie ten sam obraz zostanie przetworzony dwukrotnie, algorytm wykrywa to przed ostatecznym zatwierdzeniem metadanych i pomija tworzenie zduplikowanej ga≈Çƒôzi

To podej≈õcie jest szczeg√≥lnie cenne dla:
- **Analizy rodzin obraz√≥w**: Zrozumienia, jak r√≥≈ºne warianty obrazu (r√≥≈ºne wersje, architektury lub konfiguracje) sƒÖ ze sobƒÖ powiƒÖzane
- **Wp≈Çywu obrazu bazowego**: Zobaczenia, jak zmiany w obrazie bazowym wp≈ÇywajƒÖ na wiele obraz√≥w pochodnych
- **Mo≈ºliwo≈õci optymalizacji**: Identyfikowania wsp√≥≈Çdzielonych komponent√≥w, kt√≥re mo≈ºna lepiej wykorzystaƒá w r√≥≈ºnych wariantach obrazu

![Struktura repozytorium wielu obraz√≥w pokazujƒÖca wsp√≥lnƒÖ bazƒô i rozga≈ÇƒôziajƒÖce siƒô ga≈Çƒôzie](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Virviil/oci2git/main/./assets/multiimage.png)

### Dodatkowe przypadki u≈ºycia

- **Audyt bezpiecze≈Ñstwa**: Identyfikacja dok≈Çadnego momentu wprowadzenia podatnych pakiet√≥w lub konfiguracji oraz mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá prze≈õledzenia ich do konkretnych instrukcji budowania.
- **Optymalizacja obrazu**: Analiza struktury warstw w celu znalezienia zbƒôdnych operacji lub du≈ºych plik√≥w, kt√≥re mo≈ºna skonsolidowaƒá, pomagajƒÖc zmniejszyƒá rozmiar obrazu.
- **ZarzƒÖdzanie zale≈ºno≈õciami**: Monitorowanie, kiedy zale≈ºno≈õci zosta≈Çy dodane, zaktualizowane lub usuniƒôte w historii obrazu.
- **Usprawnienie procesu budowania**: Analiza sk≈Çadu warstw w celu optymalizacji instrukcji Dockerfile dla lepszego buforowania i mniejszego rozmiaru obrazu.
- **Por√≥wnanie obraz√≥w**: Konwersja wielu powiƒÖzanych obraz√≥w do repozytori√≥w Git i wykorzystanie narzƒôdzi por√≥wnawczych Git do analizy ich r√≥≈ºnic i wsp√≥lnych cech.

Content:

```bash
brew tap virviil/oci2git
brew install oci2git
```
Translation:
```bash
brew tap virviil/oci2git

```

Content:
#### Debian / Ubuntu

Download and install the .deb package from the [latest release](https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest):
Translation:
#### Debian / Ubuntu

Pobierz i zainstaluj pakiet .deb z [najnowszego wydania](https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest):

RowTranslations.originContent: Download and install the .deb package from the [latest release](https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest):

Content:
```bash
# For amd64 (x86_64)
wget https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest/download/oci2git_VERSION_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i oci2git_VERSION_amd64.deb

# For arm64
wget https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest/download/oci2git_VERSION_arm64.deb
sudo dpkg -i oci2git_VERSION_arm64.deb
```
Translation:
```bash
# For amd64 (x86_64)
wget https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest/download/oci2git_VERSION_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i oci2git_VERSION_amd64.deb

# For arm64
wget https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest/download/oci2git_VERSION_arm64.deb
sudo dpkg -i oci2git_VERSION_arm64.deb
```

Content: #### Arch Linux (AUR)
Translation: #### Arch Linux (AUR)

Content:
```bash
# Using yay
yay -S oci2git-bin

# Using paru
paru -S oci2git-bin

# Manual installation
git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/oci2git-bin.git
cd oci2git-bin
makepkg -si
```
Translation:
```bash
# Using yay
yay -S oci2git-bin

# Using paru
paru -S oci2git-bin

# Manual installation
git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/oci2git-bin.git
cd oci2git-bin
makepkg -si
```

Content:
### Pre-built Binaries

Download the appropriate binary for your platform from the [latest release](https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest):
Translation:
### Gotowe pliki binarne

Pobierz odpowiedni plik binarny dla swojej platformy z [najnowszego wydania](https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest):

RowTranslations.originContent: Download the appropriate binary for your platform from the [latest release](https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest):
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Pobierz odpowiedni plik binarny dla swojej platformy z [najnowszego wydania](https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest):

Content:
```bash
# Linux x86_64
wget https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest/download/oci2git-linux-x86_64.tar.gz
tar xzf oci2git-linux-x86_64.tar.gz
sudo mv oci2git-linux-x86_64 /usr/local/bin/oci2git
chmod +x /usr/local/bin/oci2git

# macOS (Apple Silicon)
wget https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest/download/oci2git-darwin-aarch64.tar.gz
tar xzf oci2git-darwin-aarch64.tar.gz
sudo mv oci2git-darwin-aarch64 /usr/local/bin/oci2git
chmod +x /usr/local/bin/oci2git
```
Translation:
```bash
# Linux x86_64
wget https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest/download/oci2git-linux-x86_64.tar.gz
tar xzf oci2git-linux-x86_64.tar.gz
sudo mv oci2git-linux-x86_64 /usr/local/bin/oci2git
chmod +x /usr/local/bin/oci2git

# macOS (Apple Silicon)
wget https://github.com/virviil/oci2git/releases/latest/download/oci2git-darwin-aarch64.tar.gz
tar xzf oci2git-darwin-aarch64.tar.gz
sudo mv oci2git-darwin-aarch64 /usr/local/bin/oci2git
chmod +x /usr/local/bin/oci2git
```

Content: ## Usage
Translation: ## U≈ºytkowanie

Content:
```bash
oci2git [OPTIONS] <IMAGE>
```
Translation:
```bash
oci2git [OPTIONS] <IMAGE>
```

Content:
Arguments:
  `<IMAGE>`  Image name to convert (e.g., 'ubuntu:latest') or path to tarball when using the tar engine

Options:
  `-o, --output <o>`  Output directory for Git repository [default: ./container_repo]
  `-e, --engine <ENGINE>`  Container engine to use (docker, nerdctl, tar) [default: docker]
  `-h, --help`            Print help information
  `-V, --version`         Print version information

Environment Variables:
  `TMPDIR`  Set this environment variable to change the default location used for intermediate data processing. This is platform-dependent (e.g., `TMPDIR` on Unix/macOS, `TEMP` or `TMP` on Windows).

## Examples

Using Docker engine (default):
Translation:
Argumenty:
  `<IMAGE>`  Nazwa obrazu do konwersji (np. 'ubuntu:latest') lub ≈õcie≈ºka do archiwum tar przy u≈ºyciu silnika tar

Opcje:
  `-o, --output <o>`  Katalog wyj≈õciowy dla repozytorium Git [domy≈õlnie: ./container_repo]
  `-e, --engine <ENGINE>`  Silnik kontenerowy do u≈ºycia (docker, nerdctl, tar) [domy≈õlnie: docker]
  `-h, --help`            Wy≈õwietl informacje pomocy
  `-V, --version`         Wy≈õwietl informacje o wersji

Zmienne ≈õrodowiskowe:
  `TMPDIR`  Ustaw tƒô zmiennƒÖ ≈õrodowiskowƒÖ, aby zmieniƒá domy≈õlnƒÖ lokalizacjƒô u≈ºywanƒÖ do przetwarzania danych po≈õrednich. Jest to zale≈ºne od platformy (np. `TMPDIR` w Unix/macOS, `TEMP` lub `TMP` w Windows).

## Przyk≈Çady

U≈ºycie silnika Docker (domy≈õlnie):

Content:
```bash
oci2git -o ./ubuntu-repo ubuntu:latest
```
Translation:
```bash
oci2git -o ./ubuntu-repo ubuntu:latest
```

Content: Using an already downloaded image tarball:
Translation: U≈ºywanie ju≈º pobranego archiwum tarball obrazu:

Content:
```bash
oci2git -e tar -o ./ubuntu-repo /path/to/ubuntu-latest.tar
```
Translation:
```bash
oci2git -e tar -o ./ubuntu-repo /path/to/ubuntu-latest.tar
```

Content: The tar engine expects a valid OCI format tarball, which is typically created with `docker save`:
Translation: Silnik tar oczekuje prawid≈Çowego pliku tar w formacie OCI, kt√≥ry zwykle jest tworzony za pomocƒÖ polecenia `docker save`:

Content:
```bash
# Create a tarball from a local Docker image
docker save -o ubuntu-latest.tar ubuntu:latest

# Convert the tarball to a Git repository
oci2git -e tar -o ./ubuntu-repo ubuntu-latest.tar
```
Translation:
```bash
# Create a tarball from a local Docker image
docker save -o ubuntu-latest.tar ubuntu:latest

# Convert the tarball to a Git repository
oci2git -e tar -o ./ubuntu-repo ubuntu-latest.tar
```

Content:
This will create a Git repository in `./ubuntu-repo` containing:
- `Image.md` - Complete metadata about the image in Markdown format
- `rootfs/` - The filesystem content from the container

The Git history reflects the container's layer history:
- The first commit contains only the `Image.md` file with full metadata
- Each subsequent commit represents a layer from the original image
- Commits include the Dockerfile command as the commit message

## Repository Structure
Translation:
To utworzy repozytorium Git w `./ubuntu-repo`, zawierajƒÖce:
- `Image.md` - Pe≈Çne metadane obrazu w formacie Markdown
- `rootfs/` - Zawarto≈õƒá systemu plik√≥w z kontenera

Historia Git odzwierciedla historiƒô warstw kontenera:
- Pierwszy commit zawiera tylko plik `Image.md` z pe≈Çnymi metadanymi
- Ka≈ºdy kolejny commit reprezentuje warstwƒô z oryginalnego obrazu
- Commity zawierajƒÖ polecenie z Dockerfile jako wiadomo≈õƒá commita

## Struktura repozytorium

Content:
```
repository/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .git/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Image.md     # Complete image metadata
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ rootfs/      # Filesystem content from the container
```
Translation:
```
repository/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .git/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Image.md     # Complete image metadata
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ rootfs/      # Filesystem content from the container
```
